Text: AVG says that the reload.exe file in the crack folder in CD 1 is a trojan!

I only come to 26% in the installation process, then it tells me:

A problem occurred when trying to transfer the file 'L:\speed.exe' from the media.
Do you want to retry to copy the file, or cancel the installation?

I couldn't even copy speed.exe from the disk!
I've got the same problem, I think, the first CD is incorrect, but the another CDs are working. I've downloaded an another first CD, and I could install the game. So if you can, fix that problem.
